data.name: Wordle 5
data.detailed_description:
Wordle 5 is the culminating sequel to the Wordle series with 10 upgraded categories and over 500 advanced vocabulary puzzles, brand new challenges, from the easiest to the most challenging vocabulary brain training puzzles.
peculiarities
The number of starting tips removed.
Categories open as you progress through the game in turn
New categories await you, such as:
  • Forest
  • Kingdom
  • The rivers
  • Cities
  • plants
  • Tanks
as well as other categories await you inside.
New puzzles - new only Wordle!

data.short_description: Wordle 5 is the culmination of the Wordle series with brand new puzzles 10 new categories, 500 puzzles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 55 MB available space
